headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FABRIKANT, PAMELA LORBER

snippet: FABRIKANT--Pamela Lorber, passed away on July 14, 2016. Beloved wife of Peter. Loving step mother of Brett and Brian. Proud grandmother of Ethan, Jared, Adam and Ben. Cherished mommy of her pups Zsu Zsu Mignon and Baby Joli. She fought a 16 year v...
lead_paragraph: FABRIKANT--Pamela Lorber, passed away on July 14, 2016. Beloved wife of Peter. Loving step mother of Brett and Brian. Proud grandmother of Ethan, Jared, Adam and Ben. Cherished mommy of her pups Zsu Zsu Mignon and Baby Joli. She fought a 16 year victorious battle with cancer. She was strong, unique and loved by many. Donations in her name may be made to: www.annieappleseedproject .org. Service 2pm Monday at "The Riverside," 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave. 1/3
